document.full_text: russian billionaire yuri milner, a venture capitalist and social networking investor who has invested hundreds of millions of dollars in facebook, groupon and zynga, is opening an office in hong kong, according to a source familiar with the matter.
document.title: facebook investor milner to open hk office: source
lines_and_colors: russian billionaire yuri milner, a venture capitalist and social networking investor who has invested hundreds of millions of dollars in facebook, groupon and zynga, is opening an office in hong kong, according to a source familiar with the matter.
